data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Bhilwara, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bhilwara, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Bhilwara, Rajasthan, India to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the county of Bhilwara, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Bhilwara, Rajasthan, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, I pray that the Brahmin Sankliwal people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Brahmin Sankliwal people know you.
Father, you gave the church of Bhilwara, Rajasthan, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Bhilwara, Rajasthan, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Bhilwara, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

location.name: Bhilwara
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Srimali, Rajput (Hindu traditions), Brahmin Srigaud, Valmiki (Balmiki) Chuhra, Sargara
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Brahmin Srimali (56,000), Rajput (Hindu traditions) (45,306,000), Brahmin Srigaud (99,000), Valmiki (Balmiki) Chuhra (1,800), Sargara (145,000)
